alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 12:40PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN MILLARD...WESTERN PIUTE...NORTHWESTERN GARFIELD...SOUTHWESTERN SEVIER...EASTERN BEAVER AND NORTHEASTERN IRON COUNTIES... At 1237 PM MST...an area of moderate to heavy snow was impacting the Interstate 15 corridor from Beaver to Cedar City. Winter driving conditions including snow covered roads can be expected in this area. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Junction, Enoch, Parowan, Monroe, Paragonah, Marysvale, Cove Fort, Summit, Sevier, Elsinore, Circleville, Joseph and Manderfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 64 and 139. Interstate 70 between mile markers 0 and 32. US Route 89 near mile marker 153, near mile marker 155, and between mile markers 172 and 191. Utah Route 21 between mile markers 97 and 107. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. * snowfall accumulation of one to three inches is expected in this area of heavy snow. Icy roads are possible as this snowfall quickly accumulates on area roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah
